backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing salon booking system with user profiles, salons, bookings, reviews, notifications, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles and reviews to new schema by adding optional profilePhoto and photo fields respectively.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including profile management, navigation improvements, salon/customer profile pages, and review functionality with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the salon booking application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with warm earth tones suitable for salon booking interface.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Baitoo application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling push notifications for bookings with notification display, click handling, client messaging, and sound/vibration support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow, profile setup modal, push notifications initialization, and route definitions for all customer, salon owner, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity for authentication, handles login state, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for new user profile setup that collects name, phone number, and user type (customer or salon_owner), then redirects based on selection.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout wrapper with sticky header containing logo, profile button, notifications, and login button, plus mobile navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Bottom navigation bar for mobile devices that displays different menu items based on user type (customer vs salon_owner) and admin status.
frontend/src/components/notifications/Bo: Card component displaying booking request details with confirm/cancel actions for salon owners, including customer info, service, and time slot.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Bell icon with badge showing pending booking notifications for salon owners, opens popover with scrollable list of notification cards.
frontend/src/components/shared/ImageUplo: Image upload component supporting both file selection from gallery and camera capture, with preview and remove functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerNotificati: Polls for customer notifications every 10 seconds, displays toast notifications for booking confirmations/cancellations, and marks them as delivered to prevent duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
Requests browser notification permissions and registers a service worker for push notifications when a user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, salons, services, bookings, reviews, and notifications with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderChecker.ts: Polls every 60 seconds for pending bookings requiring reminders for salon owners and sends browser notifications via service worker.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using warm earth tones suitable for a salon application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays and manages all salons and users with delete functionality, protected by admin permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Booking confirmation page that displays successful booking details with navigation options to view bookings or browse more salons.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Appointment booking page where customers select a service and time slot for a specific salon and submit the booking.
Customer bookings list page displaying all user bookings with status badges and review submission functionality for completed bookings.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfilePage.t: Customer profile management page allowing users to update their name, phone number, and profile photo with booking statistics display.
frontend/src/pages/SalonBookingsDashboar: Salon owner dashboard displaying all bookings for their salon with ability to mark bookings as complete and view customer details.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific salon including services, reviews, and ratings, with a booking dialog for customers to select services, time slots, and dates.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDiscoveryPage.ts: Lists all available salons in Faizabad with basic information (name, address, contact, hours) and navigation to individual salon detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SalonProfilePage.tsx: Allows salon owners to create and edit their business profile including name, address, contact number, opening hours, and profile photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/SalonReviewsPage.tsx: Displays all customer reviews for a salon with ratings, comments, photos, and timestamps, sorted by newest first.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceManagementPage: Enables salon owners to add, edit, and manage their service offerings with names and prices through a dialog interface.
frontend/src/pages/TimeSlotManagementPag: Allows salon owners to create and manage available booking time slots by adding or removing time entries.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner and feature cards (Find Salons, Book Appointments, Leave Reviews), redirecting authenticated users to appropriate dashboards based on their user type (customer or salon_owner).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordion components with typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata for Baitoo salon booking app targeting Faizabad, India, defining two-sided marketplace architecture with salon owners and customers, phone authentication, booking management, and admin panel features for MVP supporting 10-20 salons.
